## Atom for hacking some python

- [Useful extensions for Atom and Python](https://medium.com/issuehunt/20-atom-plug-ins-for-python-development-d6b10f8fa33e)

- Open the Install Packages/Themes by click Packages --> Settings View and select Install Packages/Themes.

- [Run Python - Package for Atom](https://atom.io/packages/atom-python-run)

- Install [python tools](https://atom.io/packages/python-tools) and run python code from atom
